backend/main.mo: Implements authorization, user profile storage, and order submission with optional file references, restricting profile and order access based on permissions.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature updates with associated files, components, test IDs, and confidence for pricing and services page modifications.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of each frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and OKLCH-based color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata and mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with a single root layout and page routes for the app.
frontend/src/components/auth/HeaderAuthC: Authentication control handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer showing brand info, links, and contact details with attribution and dynamic year.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Responsive navigation header with dynamic active states, auth controls, and mobile drawer menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Layout component that renders header, footer, and children, with a dev-only effect detecting duplicate homepage sections.
Order form handling user input, file upload, validation, and booking submission via useSubmitBooking.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Portfo: Dialog displaying a portfolio item's details including category, title, description, and full-size image.
frontend/src/config/contactLinks.ts: Defines contact handles and utility getters for WhatsApp, email, and Instagram URLs.
frontend/src/config/portfolioSamples.ts: Contains portfolio sample metadata including categories, images, and descriptions.
frontend/src/config/services.ts: Lists available design services with pricing, features, and categories, plus a lookup helper.
frontend/src/config/siteData.ts: Static site branding and content data for hero and about sections.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, identity loading, and status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a query hook for fetching all orders using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitBooking.ts: Handles booking submission, including file conversion to backend format and error/state management.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables, dark mode styles, custom scrollbars, and utility classes for gradients, glow, and card effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders contact options for WhatsApp, email, and Instagram using styled cards and external links.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage with a hero section, featured services, and marketing content using styled components.
frontend/src/pages/OrderBookingPage.tsx: Displays an order form and shows a success message upon submission with navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: Shows a filterable grid of portfolio samples with category selection and a detail dialog.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Lists service offerings with pricing, features, and links to prefilled order forms.
frontend/src/utils/orderPrefill.ts: Provides helper functions to encode and decode service IDs for URL prefill.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions to read URL params (including hash), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from storage or the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, shadows, and typography with a custom theme and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file describing the site's purpose, design guidelines, requirements, existing features, and known issues.
